benchmark_details.name: Vy¯akarana: A Colorless Green Benchmark for Syntactic Evaluation in Indic Languages
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a benchmark of Colorless Green sentences in Indic languages for syntactic evaluation of multilingual language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a challenging environment to evaluate multilingual language models for their syntactic abilities.

data.source: Hindi Universal Dependency Treebank (HDTB) and Tamil Universal Dependency Treebank (TTB)
data.annotation: Manual annotation based on treebank standards.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on performance across various tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better syntactic understanding from the models.
methodology.validation: Validates via comparative performance metrics against different multilingual models.
